name: Unknown (itch) (niketso, Alberto210)
description:
A Point and Click adventure with Survival and Puzzle elements.

You wake up in a hospital bed. You are all alone and don't remember what happened. Find a way out!

You play as a Firefighter who lost his memory and woke up in a chaotic zombie-apocalyptic world. Remember who you are and survive! 

This game is a Prototype, a glimpse of what we could do and more.

Credits

(in alphabetical order)

  1. Lisandro Guevara.
  2. Nicolas Piccitto.

This game was also possible thanks to the support of these "Image Campus" professors:

  1. Roy Magariños.
  2. Andrés Vergez.
